creator: LvB Software
descriptionHtml:
Truth ❓ or Dare🔥💏🤗

The app is well suited as a drinking game 🍻 (from 2 players). Especially if you are not so familiar, this game is very well suited.

Features
- more than 100 questions or tasks
- input of names (min. 2 players)
- random choice between truth and dare
- completely in English 🇬🇧
- can also be played offline
- Free
descriptionShort: Answer a slippery question or complete a task 😉
title: Truth or Dare (18+) 🔥
